P01_FAIL_AXIOM_I_DEBT.DESCRIPTION: Non-critical utility debt exceeded; initiates Self-Correction Attempt 1 (SCA1) before resorting to IH.

P01_FAIL_AXIOM_II_TIMEOUT.DESCRIPTION: ECVM validation timeout detected; requires immediate soft state reset and P-01 re-evaluation cycle.

IH_DEFAULT.DESCRIPTION: Default mapping for unhandled IH condition.
